1. Windows 11 users report critical bugs in newest KB5074105 optional January update  Neowin
  2. ‘Crashing’—Microsoft Issues Critical Warning For Windows Users  Forbes
  3. Why you need Microsoft's new emergency Windows patch - and the black-screen bug to watch for  ZDNET
  4. Microsoft links Windows 11 boot failures to failed December 2025 update  BleepingComputer
  5. Microsoft’s first Windows 11 update of 2026 has been a mess  The Verge
